description.value: When you warn an ally of an attack, you follow up with a shot at your enemy. The first time each round you use your @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Watch Out] reaction, you can make a melee or ranged Strike against the triggering creature. This Strike doesn't count toward your multiple attack penalty, and your multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike. If you hit, your target is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Suppressed] until the start of its next turn.
